 Vamprah::
 
"ok"said the femme and looking to Composer "well Composer, it's time to work"
  Alloran2@... wrote: :::Wheeljack::: 

Wheeljack: As you command sir. 
::He looked over at Vamprah and Composer:: 
Wheeljack: Looks like you two are going to the front line.  Nemises Enforcer says that it wouild be more convincing to the Maximals if you aided them in battle, so i suggest you do.  Remember to get all the information you can about the city. Good luck.
